title: Agnes in the Game of Love
description: Iduh has a character, Okonkwo, use Nigerian Pidgin to express himself, and his character is less educated and adds humor to the plot.
source: "Agnes in the Game of Love" by Thomas Iduh
text: This thing don chop una head bad bad. Idon spoil una brain and na him make una papa dey talk to una, una go begin wordam like small boy.

title: Sap No Manna
description: In The New Masquerade, one of the characters, Chief Zebrudaya, mixes his 'bombastic' English with ungrammatical Broken English forms.
source: The New Masquerade (sitcom) & "New Englishes: A West African Perspective"

title: Is English The Problem
description: In this Mark Angel Comedy series, one of the characters, Emmanuella, uses Nigerian Pidgin to express herself. Her uncle on the other hand speaks a broken form of English, which .

title: Kenyan Wildlife
description: Explore the diverse wildlife of Kenya.

title: Nairobi Law
description: In this series, Richard Mwako runs his law firm with an iron hand. He demands the best from his associates and never hesitates to make decisions that he believes are in his clients' best interests.

title: Nairobi Official Film
description: In this short film, Rachel is a typical University girl living in the heart of Nairobi with her roommate Jess. She has a boyfriend, Mike, who happens to be Jess‚Äô best friend.  Rachel has a habit of dating multiple men at ago. Mike on the other hand is convinced that Rachel is his soulmate and wants to propose. She finds herself in a fix when Mike decides he has had enough of her lies. Meanwhile, Jess‚Äô is discovering her feelings for Mike and decides to explore them further.

title: Traditional Masks
description: Discover the significance of Cameroonian masks.
